OrgMetricScanResult.name: OrgMetricScanResult
OrgMetricScanResult.description: Represents data or an item associated with a feature’s results in a Salesforce Optimizer evaluation. For example, for the Custom Field Limit feature, an OrgMetricScanResult object represents an object flagged for approaching the custom field limit.

Date.description: The date associated with an item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

Flags.description: The flags associated with an item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

ItemStatus.description: The recommended action for an item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

Name.description: The name of the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation, such as an object name.

Object.description: The object ID associated with the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation. For the Release Update feature only, Object indicates the release that the update is scheduled for.

OrgMetricScanSummaryId.description: The feature’s OrgMetricScanSummary ID from the most recent Optimizer run.

Profile.description: The profile ID associated with the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

Quantity.description: A quantity associated with the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

Type.description: The type of item or data in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

Url.description: The URL associated with the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation.

User.description: The user ID or username associated with the item in a feature’s Optimizer evaluation. For the Release Update feature only, User indicates the name of the release update that requires review.
